sentences.sentence: She speaks her lines very woodenly.
She woodenly attempted to explain her mistake, but it was just adding insult to injury.
sentences.translation: 她笨拙地企图解释所犯的错误，结果只是越描越黑。

sentences.sentence: Hansen wiped the heavy dust out of sofa hastily, stuck in sofa woodenly, as in fog; he tried to tide up main threads of the affair.
sentences.translation: 翰森草草用抹布抹去布满灰尘的沙发，呆陷在沙发上，如陷云雾，他努力想理清楚事情的头绪。
